special_text:
Whenever you amass any amount, put a loyalty counter on Lahabrea.
[0]: You lose 1 life and amass 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't have one, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)[/i]
[0]: Remove a counter from any number of permanents you control. Each opponent loses 1 life for each counter removed this way.
[-14]: You control each player during their next turn.
